attributes.action: Stop the use of Palm oil
attributes.background: Palm oil is in more than 50% of everything we use. It is destroying the rainforests of Borneo and Sumatra. Because it's destroying the rainforests the animals that live there are decreasing in population. The animals that live on the two islands are the Orangutang, tiger, elephant and rhino

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a petition calling on Parliament to legislate to make the sale of products containing palm oil to be illegal in the UK.
